meanings.definition: A type of pastry filled with meat, cheese, or vegetables.
meanings.sent1: I love to eat empanadas for lunch.
meanings.sent2: She baked delicious empanadas for the party.
meanings.sent3: The empanadas at the picnic disappeared in seconds!
meanings.sent4: The aroma of freshly baked empanadas filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The golden crust of the empanadas was perfectly crispy.

meanings.definition: The act of making or eating empanadas.
meanings.sent1: We had a fun empanadas-making competition at the cooking class.
meanings.sent2: Eating empanadas with friends is always a delightful experience.
meanings.sent3: He claimed to be the world champion of empanadas eating!
meanings.sent4: The joy of sharing empanadas with loved ones is priceless.
meanings.sent5: The sound of laughter filled the room during the empanadas feast.
